issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: UFS shouldn't be generating long stacktraces about loadbalancing when service image is not installed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
In a qa edge setup stack traces are logged in cloud-error.log on the "ufs" host for block storage and object storage when those services are not yet configured:

{code}

timeException: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: SC blockstoragemanager not configured. Found empty or unset manager(null).  Legal values are: overlay,das,ceph-rbd

fields.summary: Stack traces logged for services with missing configuration
